description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
 
40082 - Support to apply Conditional Formatting to Pivot Tables
40176 - Read configuration of Group Fields in Pivot Tables
40245 - Convert Worksheet to SVG
 
Enhancements
 
40109 - NullReferenceException when opening document with auto-formatted Pivot Table
40147 - Pivot Table’s filtering in MS Excel 2007 and later versions
40148 - Chart’s formatting issue
40157 - Copying worksheet does not work
40172 - Smart Marker Tags conversion 
40179 - Missing properties (Pivot Table) 
40180 - Missing properties (Pivot Field)
40213 - PivotField.ShowCompact - Incorrect property value in XLS format
40215 - Pivot Field’s incorrect items value in the grouped fields 
40217 - Reading items from cache (Pivot Field) 
40268 - Problems opening a SpreadsheetML file
 
Performance
 
40121 - Performance issue on adding range names
40257 - Memory exception and formula calculations on cells
 
Exceptions
 
40047 - Unable to copy a particular worksheet into another workbook 
40117 - Pivot table throws exception while refreshing 
40235 - ListBox with assigned Input range causes Aspose.Cells crush
 
Bugs
 
40042 - Failed to refresh pivot table in an Excel workbook
40066 - Problem with default paper size
40119 - Dirty right border on image when converting XLS to PDF
40152 - Workbook.CalculateFormula() method bug 
40178 - Multiple issues found while upgrading from v5.2.1.0 to v7.0.3.0
40184 - Unable to include Row/Column Headings and Comments in the TIFF file
40186 - Excel-to-Html - word-wrap problem
40190 - Button’s font attributes are changed after Save
40195 - Chart’s legend becomes shrunk using Shape.UpperLeftRow() method
40203 - Error in the output PDF document
40204 - Multi-line Headers not supported while rendering to PDF file 
40205 - Reading all data from the base fields of Pivot Table
40210 - Exporting Excel sheet to DataTable gives error
40231 - Opening ODS files issue
40232 - Cell border is not rendered properly with Aspose.Cells v7.0.4.x
40234 - Formula results in #Ref 
40241 - XLS file crashes MS Excel 2007
40255 - Error opening file using Ms Excel
40259 - Problem with HTML output in the new Aspose.Cells DLL (version)  
40261 - Updating XLSX file with Pivot Table causes Excel to display error
40262 - ToImage function generating extra column in the generated image (Sheet-to-Image issue) 
40272 - Excel 2007 workbook with multiple colored tables is not rendered in the converted PDF file
40273 - Using the Fitting Sheet on One Page option in Excel to convert to PDF does not seem to work
40274 - Multiple issues while upgrading from v5.2.1.0 to v7.0.3.0
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
